name: javascript-to-purescript
description: Javascript to Purescript Tutorial Series. See https://medium.com/@kelleyalex/index-make-the-leap-from-javascript-to-purescript-a1566d657e9c

scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules && rimraf output && rimraf .spago && rimraf .purs-repl && rimraf .psci_modules && rimraf .psc-ide-port
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run install && npm run build && npm run exec
